revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The Shamrock; or, Hibernian cresses. A collection pf poems, songs, epigrams, &c. Latin as well as English, the original production of Ireland. To which are subjoin..."
revision.text: Possibly: The Shamrock; or, Hibernian cresses. A collection pf poems, songs, epigrams, &c. Latin as well as English, the original production of Ireland. To which are subjoined, Thoughts on the prevailing system of school education, respecting young ladies as well as gentlemen: with practical proposals for a reformation / By Samuel Whyte... (Dublin : Printed by R. Marchbank, for the editor, 1772). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1306902~S1
